channel.title: MIDI Controller accumulator
channel.description: Dear all, I'm trying to build a very simple counter going from 0 to 7 controlled by CC Midi In, this one it's actually working but it only goes if controller changes...so every time I press the same button to accumulate it doesn't work and can't figure out why at the moment counter_notworking.axp (2.4 KB)

item.title: MIDI Controller accumulator
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

AdrianWillaert:

counter_notworking.axp

first, you might as well use CC i (rather than cc i any)

then as @alex says you want to use value, usually something like a midi button will go 0 to 127 to 0,
(assuming its a momentary button or not, some will latch, but they are not really suitable for what you want)

so i would do
cc i (120) , midiCC > 0 into counter inc
cc i (121) , midiCC > 0 into counter dec
